title: Going to the Doctor
subtle: Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 162 words, Level G (Grade 1), Lexile 480L
description: Many people go to the doctor for a checkup. Going to the Doctor lets students tag along on a young girl's visit to the doctor for her yearly checkup. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of conjunctions.
reviewWords: blood pressure, checkup, cuff, doctor, height, weight
comprehension: Author's Purpose                : Determine the author’s purpose for writing
awareness: Variant Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate variant vowel /oo/ sound within words
phonics: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraph oo words
grammar: Conjunctions : Recognize and use the conjunction and
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word around
